mapper.select: /* kr.fingate.gs.sales.cstmr.dao.CstmrDao.getCstmrList */ SELECT CS.CSTMR_NO , CS.CSTMR_NAME , CS.CLPHN_NO , CS.IDNTN_NO , CS.GENDER , CS.BRTHD , CS.CSTMR_TYPE , CS.PRVCY_USE_AGRMN_YN , CS.MRKTN_RCV_AGRMN_YN , CS.RSPNS_USER_NO , U.USER_NAME AS RSPNS_USER_NAME , U.ORGNZ_NO AS RSPNS_ORGNZ_NO , U.ORGNZ_NAME AS RSPNS_ORGNZ_NAME FROM TB_CSTMR CS JOIN TB_USER U ON CS.RSPNS_USER_NO = U.USER_NO

/* kr.fingate.gs.sales.cstmr.dao.CstmrDao.getCstmr */ SELECT CS.CSTMR_NO , CS.CSTMR_NAME , CS.CLPHN_NO , CS.IDNTN_NO , CS.GENDER , CS.BRTHD , CS.CSTMR_TYPE , CS.PRVCY_USE_AGRMN_YN , CS.MRKTN_RCV_AGRMN_YN , CS.RSPNS_USER_NO , U.USER_NAME AS RSPNS_USER_NAME , U.ORGNZ_NO AS RSPNS_ORGNZ_NO , U.ORGNZ_NAME AS RSPNS_ORGNZ_NAME FROM TB_CSTMR CS JOIN TB_USER U ON CS.RSPNS_USER_NO = U.USER_NO

/* kr.fingate.gs.sales.cstmr.dao.CstmrDao.getCstmrMemoList*/ SELECT CSM.MEMO_SEQ , CSM.CSTMR_NO , CSM.PRCSN_CLASS , CSM.MEMO , DATE_FORMAT(CSM.REG_DATE, '%Y%m%d%H%i%S') AS REG_DATE , CSM.REG_USER_NO , U.USER_NAME AS REG_USER_NAME , U.ORGNZ_NO AS REG_ORGNZ_NO , U.ORGNZ_NAME AS REG_ORGNZ_NAME FROM TB_CSTMR_MEMO CSM JOIN TB_USER U ON CSM.REG_USER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE CSM.DATA_STATE = 'A' AND CSM.CSTMR_NO = #{cstmrNo} ORDER BY CSM.REG_DATE DESC

/* kr.fingate.gs.sales.cstmr.dao.CstmrDao.getSmsAuthNo */ SELECT RM FROM ( SELECT LPAD(CAST( CAST( RAND()*100000 AS UNSIGNED) AS CHAR), 5, '0') AS RM UNION SELECT LPAD(CAST( CAST( RAND()*100000 AS UNSIGNED) AS CHAR), 5, '0') AS RM ) A WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_CSTMR_SMS_AUTH CSSA WHERE CSSA.AUTH_NO = RM AND CSSA.REG_DATE >= NOW()-1/24/12 AND CSSA.REG_DATE <= NOW() + 1/24/12 ) LIMIT 1
